subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Besides John Tavares, the top overall pick in the 2009 draft, the finalists are the Penguins’ Sidney Crosby and the Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin.
snippet: Besides John Tavares, the top overall pick in the 2009 draft, the finalists are the Penguins’ Sidney Crosby and the Capitals’ Alex Ovechkin.
